rows.label: tlk47300164_01_msg0001
rows.name:
*yaaaawn* Another peaceful day...
Oh! Outsiders! This is a surprise!

rows.label: tlk47300164_01_msg0002
rows.name:
We split up the work between us here
in the village. I do the nightly rounds.

rows.label: tlk47300164_01_msg0003
rows.name:
There's your odd Bunnit that creeps
in, but aside from that, it's not very
eventful. All the better, really.

rows.label: tlk47300164_01_msg0101
rows.name:
Rex? Is that you?! You've grown
since I last saw you!

rows.label: tlk47300164_01_msg0104
rows.name: Haha... I suppose I have, yeah!

rows.label: tlk47300164_01_msg0102
rows.name:
Correl's been worrying her head off
about you. Whether you're eating okay,
hoping you didn't get swindled...

rows.label: tlk47300164_01_msg0103
rows.name:
But I can see you're perfectly fine! And
you made a nice circle of friends too,
so that should put her mind at ease!
